stdout:
Table	Create Table
coach_profiles	CREATE TABLE `coach_profiles` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `displayName` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `bio` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `specializations` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `languages` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `cefrLevels` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `hourlyRate` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','active','suspended','inactive') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `avatarUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `linkedinUrl` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `totalStudents` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `totalSessions` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `averageRating` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `suspendedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `suspendedReason` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `approvedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `approvedBy` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
